original:
Business partnering refers to the establishment of successful, long-term strategic relationships between customers and suppliers, aimed at achieving best practices and sustainable competitive advantage. This concept also encompasses a support service model in which professionals, such as Human Resources (HR) staff, collaborate closely with business leaders and line managers to fulfill shared organizational objectives.

In practice, the
